text: k̄heā kl̀āw ẁā k̄ĥā tæ̀ phrap̄hū̂pĕncêāk̄hxng k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ thæ̂cring k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ k̄hx khwām khûmkhrxng t̀x phraxngkh̒ th̀ān h̄ı̂ pĥn cāk kār r̂xngreīyn t̀x phraxngkh̒ th̀ān nı s̄ìng thī̀ k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ mị̀mī khwām rū̂ nı reụ̄̀xng nận læa h̄āk phraxngkh̒ th̀ān mị̀ thrng xp̣hạy kæ̀ k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ læa mị̀ thrng mettā k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ læ̂w k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ k̆ ca xyū̀ nı h̄mū̀ p̄hū̂ k̄hādthun
